keywords: ['four on the floor', 'slow tempo', 'rock', 'metallic electric guitar riff', 'hard rock', 'raspy croacky male rock vocal', 'loud thumping']
caption: This is a hard rock clip with a metallic electric guitar riff that follows the melody of the lead vocal. Percussively, there is a four on the floor drum beat that is loud and thumping. The lead vocalist has a croaky and gritty voice.
